title: Mac in game screen won't open fully!!!
body: My in game screen won't open all the way. I've tried several times and now i have leave buster because clearly its my fault. Riot letting players take credit for their mistakes. no warning about it. nothing. just leave buster!

replies.body: We've been investigating this issue, and believe it may have something to do with custom resolution settings.  Tapping  Alt+Enter in-game to toggle your screen to Windowed mode can serve as a workaround for now.  I can't make any guarantees about removing your leaverbuster, but his ut ups in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as we like to look at each issue individually.  I hope that helps!
